title: Big Ticket
description: A browser extension and web app that helps users make confident purchasing decisions for big-ticket items through price tracking and product comparisons.

title: MonsterNums
description: A Math-learning platform for children with ADHD and neurodivergent needs

title: Sticket.In LLC

title: WeManage

title: GraduateNU
